page.title: 07Farming in Kirkby
page.content: { New Farm}. We went to see New Farm, which is on all the maps that we have. We found that houses and bungalows had been built on that land in 1981. There are between twenty and thirty houses on the site which is known now as The Paddock. {Bentinck Colliery }own 80 acres for farming.7.5 acres are used for barley. In 1978 the restoration of the pit tips won a national award from the Business and Industry Awards scheme. The first 16 acres of restored land on this tip were handed over in 1971, more land being added to this as work progressed. At the present time Mr Lee is farming 70 acres of restored land.
